summary: "Bewitched" is an old TV show about a witch named Samantha who marries a normal guy named Darrin. She tries to live a regular life as a housewife. It was really popular when it first came out and is still shown today. The show stars Elizabeth Montgomery and had two actors play Darrin: Dick York and later Dick Sargent. It's considered one of the best TV shows ever and had a very good episode called "Divided He Falls."
title: Bewitched
